Name: S3BucketPolicy
Documentation:
The AWS::S3::BucketPolicy type applies an Amazon S3 bucket policy to an Amazon S3 bucket.
AWS::S3::BucketPolicy Snippet: Declaring an Amazon S3 Bucket Policy

Parameters.Name: Bucket
Parameters.Documentation: The Amazon S3 bucket that the policy applies to.

Parameters.Name: PolicyDocument
Parameters.Documentation: A policy document containing permissions to add to the specified bucket. For more information, see Access Policy Language Overview in the Amazon Simple Storage Service Developer Guide.
